Camera Emulation

Introduction

camera emulation is a virtual camera which supports some of the features of the real camera. This feature will be useful when you don’t have access to a real camera during software development

Setup Camera emulation

To enable camera emulation you can use the enable_camera_emulation method method in the Collector class. you should pass the number of cameras that you want into this method. after calling this method, camera emulation would be added to the list of devices

import dorsaPylon
from dorsaPylon import Collector

collector = Collector()

#enable camera emulation and pass your ideal camera counts
collector.enable_camera_emulation(2)

#get avialble cameras only in class of emlulation
cameras = collector.get_all_cameras(camera_class=dorsaPylon.CamersClass.emulation)

camera1 = cameras[0]

#Set gain parameter
camera1.Parms.set_gain(50)
